Despite advancements in cybersecurity, there is always a risk of becoming a victim of phishing emails. In these types of scams, cybercriminals impersonate a trusted entity to trick you into divulging sensitive information such as login credentials, financial details, or personal information.
Here are some common tactics and strategies used by phishing email cybercriminals to steal these credentials, along with a simple way you can avoid falling victim:
Tactics and Strategies Used by Phishing Email Cybercriminals:
1. Pretexting: An attempt to masquerade as a legitimate organization or event by pretending to represent a company
